description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Piri Piri Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Piri Piri Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (Gas 6). Sit the chicken in a roasting tin, and roast in the oven for about 50 minutes until cooked through, golden, and crispy. Quarter to serve, and dish up with rice and a green salad.
